liability_cap: Not specified in provided excerpts (Article VII / Section 7.01 referenced but cap amount not shown).
risk_explanation: This appears to be an intellectual property agreement with broad, perpetual, fully paid-up license grants and detailed confidentiality provisions, which can create long-lived obligations and operational constraints. The excerpts reference a limitation of liability section, but the actual cap is not visible, increasing uncertainty. Governing law and exclusive Delaware jurisdiction may add litigation burden for a small SaaS vendor.
